title: Redacted
body: When I am creating a support ticket and enter all the info it will always say REDACTED anyone knows what it means? And why does it do that?

replies.body:
This is just a simple way for us to help protect your account information, no worries! 

It changes to 'REDACTED' in case someone else tries to look at your tickets, they won't be able to see any of your personal information ^_^.
